resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75493</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75493</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>d0db9d76-3528-41bd-9800-4e966c5a7cc3#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Galléros lajhár</string>
            <string language="en">Collared sloth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Collared sloth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sloth de Collared</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sloth de Collared</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sloth di Collared</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πιαμένος sloth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sloth de Collared</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A vendégízületesek rendjébe tartozik. A brazíliai esőerdőkben él. Anyagcseréje és mozgása lassú.</string>
            <string language="en">Belongs to feastor joint-cased order. Lives in Brazilian rain forests. Its metabolism and movement is slow.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emlősök,  méhlepényesek,  vendégízületesek,  Dél-Amerika,  </string>
            <string language="en">mammals, placentalia, feaster joint-cased, South America</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehört feastor Verbindung-umkleideter Ordnung. 
Leben in den brasilianischen Regenwäldern. Sein 
Metabolismus und Bewegung ist langsam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Appartient à la commande joint-enfermée par 
feastor. Les vies dans les forêts tropicales brésiliennes. 
Son métabolisme et mouvement est lent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pertence à ordem junção-encaixotada feastor. 
Vidas em florestas de chuva brazilian. Seus metabolism e 
movimento são lentos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Appartiene ad ordine giunto-messo feastor. 
Vite nelle foreste di pioggia brasiliane. Il relativi 
metabolismo e movimento è lenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανήκει κοινός-εγκιβωτισμένη στην feastor κατάταξη. 
Ζωές στα βραζιλιάνα τροπικά δάση. Ο μεταβολισμός και 
η μετακίνησή του είναι αργοί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pertenece a la orden empalme-encajonada feastor. 
Vidas en selvas tropicales brasileñas. Su metabolismo y 
movimiento es lentos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säugetiere, placentalia, feaster Verbindung-umkleidet, 
Südamerika</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mammifères, placentalia, feaster joint-enfermé, Amérique 
Du sud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mamíferos, placentalia, feaster junção-encaixotado, Ámérica
do Sul</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mammiferi, placentalia, feaster giunto-messo, Sudamerica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θηλαστικά, placentalia, feaster κοινός-εγκιβωτισμένος, 
Νότια Αμερική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mamíferos, placentalia, feaster empalme-encajonado, 
Suramérica</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75493</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>

        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=d0db9d76-3528-41bd-9800-4e966c5a7cc3&v=1&b=2</uri>
